alert.note: Alert for Ida; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 3:18PM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Iowa, northeast Nebraska and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
